thread.title: Rowe's college football picks: Oct. 24 - College Football
thread.title_full: Rowe's college football picks: Oct. 24 - College Football - NorthJersey.com

author: The Record
title: Rowe's college football picks: Oct. 24 - College Football
text:
Rowe’s picks 
*Miami (+7) against Clemson — Could be Al Golden’s last chance for the upset win that will save his job at Miami.
*USC (-3 1/2) over Utah — The Trojans build on their effort against Notre Dame. Utah doesn’t escape this time.
*Alabama (-15) over Tennessee — The Volunteers are a lot better team at home than they are on the road.
Play of the day 
*Texas (-6 1/2) over Kansas State — Texas routs Oklahoma and then the Sooners beat K-State by 55. All adds up.
Other games 
*Nebraska (-7) over Northwestern; Duke (+3) against *Virginia Tech; *Oklahoma (-14) over Texas Tech; Washington State (+7 1/2) against *Arizona
Last week: 4-3-1; Season: 20-34-2; Plays of the day: 1-5-1
